text: Troy Kavon Caesar (born 13 May 1994) is a British Virgin Islands international footballer who plays as a central defender. ==Club career== After playing club football for VG Ballstarz, Caesar played college soccer in the United States for Andrew Fighting Tigers and Life University. ==International career== Caesar made his international debut for British Virgin Islands in 2010.Caribbean Football Database profile ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
